name: Management-design
body: Their Toyota Method Management Version shows the following. ORDER plays a vital role: 1.**Dedicate to Self-Development.** Discover how to live True values via repeated learning cycles,. 2.**Train and Develop Others.** See as well as challenge true potential in others through self-development learning cycles,. 3.**Support Daily Kaizen.** Build local capacity throughout for day-to-day administration, as 14ll as. 4.**Produce Vision and also Align Goals.** Produce Real vision and align goals vertically as well as flat. Leaders cannot show exactly what they do not have. So, they need to first place on the oxygen mask of understanding (or a minimum of truly dedicate to and start to walk the roadway to understanding) before they can successfully and credibly BEGIN to trainer and establish others.
